description:
Colder climates have nothing on their men's Glover Park Lined Flannel, a heavyweight shirt that delivers plenty of warmth along with that classic flannel look. The waffle-knit thermal lining will keep you warm and cozy, whether you decide to wear it on its own or layer up under your favorite sweater.

They're also fans of the bolder colorways on this one, that help it stand out from the crowd.
name: Prana Glover Park Flannel - Mens
